lmr.command.data: Failed to get areas from the world with dimension id %s
lmr.command.noPerm: You do not have permission to edit the area '%s'!
lmr.command.notInArea: You are not standing in an area!
lmr.command.area.usage: Use '/lm area <areaName>' to see details about the area
lmr.command.area.name: Area Name:
lmr.command.area.not_exist: There is no area with the name '%s'!
lmr.command.area.noPerm: You do not have permission to edit this area
lmr.command.areas.usage: Use '/lm areas [page] [areaNameRegex]' to list all the areas, optionally with a regex filter
lmr.command.areas.title: Areas - Page %s / %s
lmr.command.claim.usage: Use '/lm claim [areaName]' to claim an area. Providing no area will try claiming the area you're standing in
lmr.command.claim.disabled: Area claiming is not enabled! Ask an OP to allocate you an area.
lmr.command.claim.request.success: Claim request successfully created for area %s
lmr.command.claim.request.failed: Claim request failed - you already have one for the area %s!
lmr.command.claim.request.opMessage: ยง7New claim request (%s) from %s for area %s
lmr.command.claim.ownLimit: You already own too many areas!
lmr.command.members.add.usage: Use '/lm members add <areaName> <playerName>' to add the player to the area
lmr.command.members.add.already: %s is already a member of area %s
lmr.command.members.remove.usage: Use '/lm members remove <areaName> <playerName>' to remove the player from the area
lmr.command.members.remove.already: %s already isn't a member of area %s
lmr.command.myareas.usage: Use '/lm myareas [page] [areaNameRegex]' to list all your areas, optionally with a regex filter
lmr.command.myareas.title: My Areas - Page %s / %s
lmr.command.setowner.usage: Use '/lm setowner <areaName> [playerName]' to set the player as the new owner of the area. OPs can provide no player to remove the owner
lmr.command.setowner.op: You must be an OP or owner of the area to use this command
lmr.command.setowner.success: The new owner of the area %s is %s
lmr.command.show.usage: Use '/lm show [areaName]'. Providing no area will show all areas nearby
lmr.command.approve.usage: Use '/lm op approve <requestId>' to approve a claim request. Check for requests using the 'requests' command
lmr.command.approve.success: Approved request %s - %s is now the owner of area %s
lmr.command.approve.playerMessage: Your request for area %s has been approved by %s!
lmr.command.approve.ownLimit: You already own too many areas!
lmr.command.delete.usage: Use '/lm op delete <areaName>' to delete an area
lmr.command.delete.notify: The area %s that you were a member of has been deleted!
lmr.command.disapprove.usage: Use '/lm op disapprove <requestId>' to disapprove a claim request. Check for requests using the 'requests' command
lmr.command.disapprove.playerMessage: Your request for area %s has been disapproved by %s!
lmr.command.requests.usage: Use '/lm op requests [page] [areaNameRegex]'. You can display requests for an area without providing the page
lmr.command.requests.title: Requests - Page %s / %s
lmr.command.requests.not_exist: There is no request with the ID %s!
lmr.command.requests.invalid: The given ID '%s' is not a number!

lmr.command.hostiles.usage: Use '/lm hostiles <areaName>' to toggle hostile entity spawning

lmr.command.hostiles.success: Set hostile entity spawning to %s for area %s
lmr.command.interactions.usage: Use '/lm interactions <areaName>' to toggle player interactions (right clicking) with blocks

lmr.command.passives.usage: Use '/lm passives <areaName>' to toggle passive entity spawning
